author: dlr
msg: JavaHL: Add changelist name and merge range fields added in 1.5 to the
(onNotify): Adjust constructor method lookup.  Pass changelist name
and merge range (with dummy value) on to the constructor

author: dlr
msg: A follow-up to r25288 to fix formatting.  No functional change.

author: markphip
msg: There is a hopefully temporary workaround method in JavaHL for a new merge
method that lets you specify an array of RevisionRange objects (cherry-pick).
This should be replaced by a native implementation when the API is created.
Currently, it just loops over the array and runs merge multiple times.
Updated the workaround method, to subtract 1 from the From Revision in the
RevisionRange object so that it merges the correct revisions.
(merge RevisionRange[]): Subtract 1 from From Revision before merging.

author: dlr
msg: svntest: When runing 'svn merge -rREV1:REV2 URL DIR', allow the '-r'
implementation to handle the the optional REV1/REV2 parameters.
